country.description: Country of group - group location where it operates from.

description.description: Description of group activities or TTP used for group actions.

more informations.description: List more informations by url - reports, group links etc..

motivation.description: Motivation behind group ie. espionage, ransomware, other criminal activity, hacktivism . . .

observed.description: What sector is this group active at? Government, telecommunication etc and country of activity.

sponsor.description: Sponsor of group ie. country, state, criminal ring, cartel etc..

tools used.description: What known tools are used by group.

description: Adversary group cards inspired by ThaiCERT
